ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name

ruleExplore.author: $.post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleExplore.name: $.post.title||$.post.digest||$.post.blogInfo.blogId||$.post.blogPageUrl##</*\w.*?>

ruleSearch.author: $.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.blogName
ruleSearch.name: $.title||$.digest||$.blogInfo.blogNiceName||$.blogNickName||$.name##</*\w.*?>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>
